articles.title: SteamOS expands to other gaming handhelds with the Lenovo Legion Go S - TechCrunch
articles.description: SteamOS is slowly becoming an alternative to Windows for handheld gaming devices. After launching the Steam Deck with SteamOS, its own operating system,
articles.content: SteamOS is slowly becoming an alternative to Windows for handheld gaming devices. After launching the Steam Deck with SteamOS, its own operating system, Valve is now partnering with third-party manuf… [+2445 chars]
